languages.text: {n}Спутник инквизитора, укутанный в алую робу {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}, склоняется перед вами. Из под медной маски, сложенной десятками аугментаций, доносится лязгающий шепот:{/n} "Слава наследни{mf|ку|це} династии фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: {n}Спутник инквизитора, укутанный в алую робу Механикус, склоняется перед вами. Из под железной маски, сложенной десятками аугментаций, доносится лязгающий шепот:{/n} "Слава наследни{mf|ку|це} дома фон Валанциус".

languages.text: {n}The Inquisitor's companion, a crimson-robed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, bows to you. From behind the brass mask mounted with dozens of augmetics comes a metallic rasp,{/n} "Glory to the von Valancius heir."
languages.original_text: {n}Спутник инквизитора, укутанный в алую робу {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}, склоняется перед вами. Из под медной маски, сложенной десятками аугментаций, доносится лязгающий шепот:{/n} "Слава наследни{mf|ку|це} династии фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor's companion, a Mechanicus wrapped in crimson robes, bows to you. From behind the iron mask lined with dozens of augments comes a clanging whisper,{/n} "Glory to the von Valancius heir."

{n}The Inquisitor's companion, a Mechanicus wrapped in crimson robes, bows to you. From behind the iron mask lined with dozens of augments comes a clanging whisper,{/n} "Glory to the von Valancius heir."

{n}The Inquisitor's companion, a crimson-robed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, bows to you. From behind the brass mask mounted with dozens of augmetics comes a metallic rasp,{/n} "Glory to the von Valancius heir."

{n}The Inquisitor's companion, a crimson-robed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, bows to you. From behind the brass mask mounted with dozens of augmetics comes a metallic rasp,{/n} "Glory to the von Valancius heir."

{n}The Inquisitor's companion, a crimson-robed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, bows to you. From behind the brass mask mounted with dozens of augmetics comes a metallic rasp,{/n} "Glory to the von Valancius heir."

languages.text: {n}異端審問官の連れである、深紅のローブに身をまとった{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の一員があなたに頭を下げる。何十本とオーグメティックがつながった真ちゅう製のマスクの下から金属音が聞こえる。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の後継者に栄光あれ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's companion, a crimson-robed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, bows to you. From behind the brass mask mounted with dozens of augmetics comes a metallic rasp,{/n} "Glory to the von Valancius heir."

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問官の連れである、深紅のローブに身をまとった{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の一員があなたに頭を下げる。何十本とオーグメティックがつながった真ちゅう製のマスクの下から金属音が聞こえる。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の後継者に栄光あれ」

languages.text: {n}审判官的同伴向你鞠了一躬。他是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的成员，身穿红色长袍，装着数十个植入物的黄铜面具后面传来了金属的嘎嘎声。{/n}“荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯家族的继承人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's companion, a crimson-robed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, bows to you. From behind the brass mask mounted with dozens of augmetics comes a metallic rasp,{/n} "Glory to the von Valancius heir."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判官的同伴向你鞠了一躬。他是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的成员，身穿红色长袍，装着数十个植入物的黄铜面具后面传来了金属的嘎嘎声。{/n}“荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯家族的继承人。”

languages.text: {n}El acompañante del Inquisidor, que viste la túnica carmesí del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, se inclina ante ti. Desde la máscara de latón cubierta de auméticos suena un jadeo metálico:{/n} «Gloria a{mf|l| la} hereder{mf|o|a} de la casa von Valancius».
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's companion, a crimson-robed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, bows to you. From behind the brass mask mounted with dozens of augmetics comes a metallic rasp,{/n} "Glory to the von Valancius heir."

traits.locale_text: {n}El acompañante del Inquisidor, que viste la túnica carmesí del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, se inclina ante ti. Desde la máscara de latón cubierta de auméticos suena un jadeo metálico:{/n} «Gloria a{mf|l| la} hereder{mf|o|a} de la casa von Valancius».

languages.text: {n}Le compagnon de l'inquisiteur, un membre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} vêtu d'une tunique rouge, s'incline à son tour. Une voix rauque et métallique vous parvient de derrière son masque en cuivre surmonté d'une dizaine d'augmétiques :{/n} « Gloire à l'{mf|héritier|héritière} von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's companion, a crimson-robed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, bows to you. From behind the brass mask mounted with dozens of augmetics comes a metallic rasp,{/n} "Glory to the von Valancius heir."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le compagnon de l'inquisiteur, un membre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} vêtu d'une tunique rouge, s'incline à son tour. Une voix rauque et métallique vous parvient de derrière son masque en cuivre surmonté d'une dizaine d'augmétiques :{/n} « Gloire à l'{mf|héritier|héritière} von Valancius. »

languages.text: {n}Der Begleiter des Inquisitors, ein Mitglied des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} in roter Robe, verbeugt sich vor dir. Hinter der Messingmaske mit Dutzenden von Augmentationen ertönt in metallisch-rauem Ton:{/n} "Hoch lebe {mf|der Erbe|die Erbin} von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's companion, a crimson-robed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, bows to you. From behind the brass mask mounted with dozens of augmetics comes a metallic rasp,{/n} "Glory to the von Valancius heir."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Begleiter des Inquisitors, ein Mitglied des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} in roter Robe, verbeugt sich vor dir. Hinter der Messingmaske mit Dutzenden von Augmentationen ertönt in metallisch-rauem Ton:{/n} "Hoch lebe {mf|der Erbe|die Erbin} von Valancius!"

languages.text: {n}Engizisyoncu'nun yoldaşı olan kızıl cübbeli {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} mensubu, karşında eğilerek seni selamlıyor. Onlarca ogmetik takılı pirinç maskenin ardından metalik bir gıcırtı duyuluyor.{/n} "Von Valanciusların vârisi çok yaşa."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's companion, a crimson-robed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, bows to you. From behind the brass mask mounted with dozens of augmetics comes a metallic rasp,{/n} "Glory to the von Valancius heir."

traits.locale_text: {n}Engizisyoncunun yoldaşlarından biri olan kızıl cübbeli {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} üyesi, karşında eğilerek selamlıyor. Onlarca ogmetik takılı pirinç maskenin ardından metalik bir gıcırtı duyuluyor.{/n} "Von Valancius vârisi çok yaşa."
